description: If the direct permission for personal information to be published is given by the individual, the data publisher should provide either a name or a combination of familyName and givenName.
An email address for the person

This person must give direct permission for their personal information to be shared as part of the Open Data.

The job title for the person, especially used in the context of a leader.

An full name for the person, where structured data around givenName and familyName is not available.
This person must give direct permission for their personal information to be shared as part of the Open Data.
A contact telephone number for the person.

A URL where more information about the person may be found
